title: [K-12] Foundations of Multimodal Feature Learning for RGB-D Scene Recognition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental computer vision concepts and machine learning
context.additional_context: Visual data analysis learning environment utilizing individual smartphones or tablets

learning_goals: Learners can identify RGB-D data components and explain camera sensor principles
Learners can implement a simple scene classification model by applying multi-scale/semantic feature extraction concepts
Learners can evaluate modality fusion strategies through correlation analysis between RGB-depth data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
